data.text: Dwoko wach mamuol kweyo mirima,
Lew ngʼat mariek konyore gi rieko,
Wenge Jehova Nyasaye ni kuonde duto,
Lep makelo ber en yath mar ngima,
Ngʼat mofuwo chayo kum mar wuon mare,
Od ngʼat makare otingʼo mwandu maduongʼ,
Dho jomariek lando ngʼeyo,
Jehova Nyasaye odagi misango mar jaricho,
Jehova Nyasaye odagi yore ngʼat marach,
Kum malit orito ngʼat maweyo yo,
Jehova Nyasaye ongʼeyo gik moko matimore,
Ngʼat ma jasunga dagi puonj,
Chuny mamor miyo wangʼ bedo gi mor,
Chuny mongʼeyo pogo tiend weche dwaro ngʼeyo,
Ndalo duto mag ngʼat mahinyore gin thagruok,
Ber bedo gi matin ka iluoro Jehova Nyasaye
Ber chamo alot kama hera nitie,
Ngʼat ma iye wangʼ piyo medo miero,
Yor jasamuoyo olor gi kuthe,
Wuowi mariek miyo wuon mare mor,
Fuwo moro ngʼat maonge gi rieko,
Chenro ok chopi nikech onge puonj makare,
Ngʼato yudo mor e dwoko mowinjore,
Yor ngima telo kadhi malo ni ngʼat makare,
Jehova Nyasaye muko od ngʼat masungore,
Jehova Nyasaye odagi paro mar joricho,
Ngʼat ma jawuoro kelo chandruok ne joode,
Chuny ngʼat makare pimo dwokoge,
Jehova Nyasaye bor gi ngʼat ma timbene richo,
Neno mamor kelo mor ni chuny,
Ngʼat machiko ite kikwere
Ngʼat ma ok dew kum ochayore owuon,
Luoro Jehova Nyasaye puonjo dhano rieko,
